short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered answers a click away. An extension for quick answers or summaries based on the YouTube video in your current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VidSense: AI-Powered Utility for YouTube

Unlock the full potential of your YouTube experience with VidSense, the intelligent browser extension that brings instant insights to your fingertips.

Key Features:
Smart Q&A: Ask questions about any YouTube video and get accurate, AI-powered answers instantly.

Quick Summaries: Get concise, AI-generated summaries to quickly grasp the main points – ideal for efficient studying or quick reviews.

Interactive Learning: Generate quizzes, request translations, and create custom prompts to interact with educational content in innovative ways.

Seamless Integration: Enjoy a smooth, distraction-free experience as VidSense works directly within your current tab.

Time-Saving: Extract key information without watching entire videos, helping you focus on what's important and save time.

Enhanced Focus: VidSense helps you pinpoint the information you need, reducing distractions and improving efficiency.

VidSense transforms how you interact with YouTube content, making information retrieval faster and more efficient. Whether you're a student, professional, or lifelong learner, VidSense is your intelligent companion for smarter video consumption.

Enhance your YouTube experience today – install VidSense and start studying smarter with ease!
